events.name: SpeedRoomMating Brooklyn @ Matt Torrey's
events.directions: L train to Grand Avenue. Walk 2 blocks north on Bushwick Avenue, bar is on the left on the corner of Bushwick and Ainslie.
events.suitability: This event is suitable for anyone looking for a room or roommate in New York.
events.areas: Brooklyn, Williamsburg, Queens, Jamaica, Astoria, Bronx, Long Island.
